        :mod (o / original))
    :ARG2 (p2 / percentage-entity

text: A customer buys the item at this discounted price using a $20-off coupon.

(b / buy-01

text: Find out which of the following values is the multiple of X, if it is divisible by 9 and 12?
amr:
(f / find-out-03
    :mode imperative
    :ARG0 (y / you)
    :ARG1 (m / multiple
        :op1 (v / variable
            :wiki -
            :name (n / name
                :op1 "X"))
        :domain (a / amr-unknown
            :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                :ARG2 (v2 / value
                    :ARG1 (f2 / follow-04
                        :ARG1 (d2 / divvy-01
                            :ARG2 t
                            :ARG1 (i2 / it)))))
            :mod (a2 / amr-unknown))
        :condition (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (d / divvy-up-01
                :ARG1 a
                :ARG2 (a3 / and
                    :op1 (v3 / variable
                        :wiki "9/12"
                        :name (n2 / name
                            :op1 9
                            :op2 12))
                    :op2 (t / thing
                        :wiki "12/12/16"
                        :name n
                        :name (n3 / name
                            :op1 12
                            :op2 9
                            :op3 12))
                    :ARG2 a3)))))

text: The number should definitely have these factors 3 × 3 × 4.
amr:
(r / recommend-01
    :ARG1 (h / have-03
        :ARG0 (n / number)
        :ARG1 (f / factor
            :mod (t / this)
            :quant (v / value-interval
                :op1 3
                :op2 3
                :op3 4))
        :mod (d / definite)))

text: 36 is the number that has these factors.
So, 36 is the multiple of X.
